description.original: Automatically adjusts tab header widths in real-time to perfectly fit each tab's title content while maintaining a clean, seamless interface that prevents awkward text truncation and ensures optimal readability of your document titles.
description.translation: Automatically adjusts tab header widths in real-time to perfectly fit each tab's title content while maintaining a clean, seamless interface that prevents awkward text truncation and ensures optimal readability of your document titles.
